play_history.challenge_reason: Talia has played three Q’s in this round, which strongly suggests she had at least three Q’s in her initial hand. With only two cards left, the odds that she still holds a Q are low; the only way she could legitimately play a Q now is if she has a Joker, which she would keep until she is very confident.
